name: RepeatAfterMe
0:
”Alexa, ask Repeat After Me to repeat it is morning”
”Alexa, ask Repeat After Me to say hi bob”
”Alexa, ask Repeat After me to repeat the weather outside is frightful”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: repeat after me
des: Have Alexa repeat whatever you say. A fun way to test what Alexa will repeat and to see if she understands you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
